title: Beware 'The Legend of Hallowdega'
text:
Shake and Bake NASCAR Blog Beware 'The Legend of Hallowdega' The rumors and myths surrounding Talladega Superspeedway are uncovered and explained in the 2010 short film called "The Legend of Hallowdega." 
The Legend of Hallowdega By Jay Pennell - Shake and Bake Crew Oct 22, 2015 at 1:10p ET 0Shares 
There are all sorts of rumors and myths about Talladega Superspeedway, the longest and fastest oval track in NASCAR. 
Indian burial grounds. 
Banana peels. 
Flesh-eating ghost hunters. 
They're all explained right here, with the help of Darrell Waltrip and Dale Earnhardt Jr ., in this 2010 short filmed called "The Legend of Hallowdega." 
Produced by former Monty Python cast member Terry Gilliam, "The Legend of Hallowdega" unlocks the dark, and at times, troubling mysteries surrounding the famed speedway. true
